participant_1.background:
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.
I think my family would be surprised and confused, but ultimately supportive.
we drink beer and eat food.
I take time to indulge in my imagination.
i love eating at mcdonalds.

participant_2.background:
My sweet tooth loves gummy worms.
I am afraid of losing my friends because they are the most important people in my life.
i paint with watercolors.
I enjoy reading with my daughter and getting lost in other worlds.
I get to share my love of animals and storytelling with others.

content.text: What are you up to today?
Not much, just painting with watercolors. My daughter is out with friends, so I have the studio to myself.
That sounds relaxing. I love painting, too. I like to paint with acrylics, though.
Acrylics are fun! Do you have a favorite subject to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and animals. I also love painting flowers.
I love painting animals, too! I have a dog and a cat, and I love to paint them.
I bet your paintings are adorable! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Bailey. He's the sweetest dog in the world.
Golden retrievers are the best dogs! I used to have a golden retriever named Buddy. He was my best friend.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm sure Buddy was a wonderful dog.
He was. He was the best dog I ever had.
I'm glad you had the chance to have him in your life.
Thanks. I miss him every day.
I'm glad we're both dog lovers!
